text:
01 of 17 REUNION SPECIAL Heidi Montag/Instagram A very pregnant Montag joined former The Hills costar Kristin Cavallari in L.A. on Aug. 30 for a pop-up celebration of Cavallari's jewelry line, Uncommon James. "This girl. Love her and that cute little belly," Cavallari wrote on Instagram. On Oct. 1, Heidi and Spencer announced the birth of their son, Gunner Stone.

02 of 17 WORK IT OUT Heidi Pratt Snapchat A growing bump doesn't stop her! Montag got a prenatal workout in on Aug. 1 and shared the sweat sesh on Snapchat.

03 of 17 OVER THE RAINBOW Source: Heidi Pratt/Instagram It's babymoon time! The parents-to-be enjoy a little R&R — and a rainbow! — in Hawaii.

04 of 17 IN THE CITY Source: Heidi Pratt/Instagram In a photo from a trip to N.Y.C., Montag cradles her bump in a form-fitting maroon dress.

05 of 17 PRETTY IN PINK Heidi Pratt Instagram With three months left to go, the mom-to-be posted a sunset profile shot on July 17.

06 of 17 TEST TIME Heidi Pratt Snapchat In a Snapchat from her doctor's office, the reality star revealed she was about to take the oft-dreaded glucose tolerance test.

07 of 17 RED, WHITE & (BABY) BLUE Mr Plow/BACKGRID The Hills alums Heidi Montag and Spencer Pratt were spotted taking part in the 40th anniversary Will Rogers run through the Pacific Palisades in Los Angeles on July 4. The pair got all dressed up in red, white and blue for the occasion, with Montag putting her baby bump on full display in an American flag tank top.

08 of 17 TWICE AS NICE Heidi Montag Instagram Hanging with a pregnant pal on the 4th of July, Montag was sure to stay made in the shade.

09 of 17 A HAPPY HOMECOMING Source: Heidi Pratt/Instagram Visiting family in Crested Butte, Colorado, Montag captioned a shot of her growing brood, "#6monthspregnant."

10 of 17 MOM & ME Heidi Montag Instagram On that same trip, the former reality star scored some time with her own mother.

11 of 17 NATURE MADE Heidi Montag Instagram A throwback shot days later was simply captioned, "Missing Colorado."

12 of 17 BUMP, THERE IT IS Heidi Pratt/Instagram At 5 months, Montag got all dressed up in a black maxi dress with a side slit.

13 of 17 RAD REFLECTION Heidi Montag Instagram A June mirror selfie showcased Montag's growing bump. And though Mom has lived her life in the spotlight, Dad Pratt is set on shielding his son both from his parents' time on The Hills and a career in reality TV. “Hell no! They’d just lose brain cells. I’m trying to have really smart kids," he joked to AskMen.com. “With all due respect to Heidi and I, we cannot afford any less brain cells than they’re already starting with at the gateway.”

14 of 17 A SPECIAL FIRST Heidi Pratt/Instagram “#happymothersday! So excited to celebrate my first Mother’s Day! #blessed,” Montag wrote along with a bump photo in May. “Thank you to all you beautiful amazing moms for your endless love and dedication! missing my mommy!”

15 of 17 PETAL POWER Heidi Montag Instagram That same day, Pratt showered his pregnant wife in some seriously gorgeous flowers. “Spencer is going to bring a lot of strength. I think that he’s very loving. He’s very loyal. He has a great heart. He’s very genuine. He’s smart. Everything,” she said of her husband's future role as Dad. “Spencer’s going to be a really great model. He’s going to be very active in our son’s life.”

16 of 17 GET GROWING Heidi Montag Instagram On April 30, it was "Sunday fun day.. the 3 of us!"
authors: Kate Hogan Is Director Of Digital Specials
As Well As The Editor Of Stories To Make You Smile. She Has Been Working At People Since
title: Heidi Montag and Spencer Pratt Pregnant, Bump Pics

meta_data.description: The latest couple in The Hills baby boom just welcomed son Gunnar Stone
